content:
I can totally relate! Heels can be a major packing mistake, especially when you're heading to a beach destination like Miami. They're heavy, take up space, and often end up gathering dust in your luggage. And you're right, Miami is all about embracing that laid-back, beachy vibe, so it's perfect for ditching the heels and opting for comfortable sandals or sneakers instead.

It's great to hear that you enjoyed the beach time, though! South Beach is definitely a highlight of Miami, and there's nothing like feeling the sun on your skin and the ocean breeze in your hair to unwind. Long walks along the shore are the best way to clear your mind and soak up the atmosphere. Did you have a favorite spot or activity on the beach, like a particular cafe or water sport?

And now that you've learned your lesson about packing, are you feeling more confident about packing light for your NYC trip? Do you have any specific plans or activities lined up for your 3-day adventure in the Big Apple?
